importantArticles.headline: Cleveland-Cliffs (NYSE:CLF) experienced an 11% price decline over the past week. This movement occurred amidst broader market volatility, as stocks fluctuated widely due to investor anxieties surrounding upcoming U.S. trade tariffs. While Cleveland-Cliffs's decline stands out, the market overall has also faced downward pressure, declining by 3% in the last week. The broader market uncertainty, fueled by concerns over economic growth and new trade barriers, likely influenced investor sentiment...
